tuv.seg: Fees and supports for third-level education
Táillí agus Tacaíocht do mhic léinn tríú leibhéil
Third-level student fees and charges
Táillí do scoláirí tríú leibhéal
This document contains information about who has to pay third-level fees
Tá eolas anseo maidir le cé a bhíonn táillí tríú leibhéal le n-íoc acu
Tax relief for third-level fees
Faoiseamh cánach ar tháillí don tríú leibhéal

Tax relief is available in respect of tuition fees paid in private third-level institutions, in institutions abroad and by repeat students and part-time students. The Student Contribution may also qualify for relief

Cur síos ar an bhfaoiseamh cánach atá le fáil ar tháillí a íoctar le hinstitiúidí príobháideacha tríú leibhéal, le hinstitiúidí thar lear, ag mic léinn atá ag athdhéanamh scrúduithe agus ag mic léinn páirt-aimseartha
Explains the Student Grant Scheme
Cur síos ar an Scéim um Dheontais do Mhic Léinn
Covers eligibility criteria and new rates
Míniú ar na critéir intofaíochta agus ar leibhéil na ndeontas
Grants and funds available for mature students
Deontais agus cistí atá ar fáil do mhic léinn aibí
Information on grants and funds available for mature students in third-level education
Eolas ar dheontais agus chistí do mhic léinn lánfhásta ag freastal ar institiúidí tríú leibhéil
Social welfare payments and the student grant
Íocaíochtaí leasa shóisialaigh agus an deontas mac léinn
Information on claiming a social welfare payment, BTEA and the student grant
Faisnéis faoi íocaíocht leasa shóisialaigh, an BTEA agus an deontas mac léinn a éileamh
This document is in: Social Welfare > Social welfare payments > Back to Education
This document is in: Leas Sóisialach > Íocaíochtaí Leasa Shóisialaigh > Filleadh ar Oideachas
Explains how postgraduates can qualify for financial assistance under the Student Grant Scheme
Mínítear conas is féidir le hiarchéimithe cáiliú le haghaidh cúnaimh faoin Scéim Deontais do Mhic Léinn
Most Read in "Education and Training"
Ábhar is mó éilimh i "Oideachas agus Oiliúint"
School terms in primary and post-primary schools
Téarmaí scoile i mbunscoileanna agus iarbhunscoileanna
Further Education and Training (FET) allowances
Liúntais Bhreisoideachais agus Oiliúna (BOO)
